entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 p.m. EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
